overview: Discover the incredible life of Daniella, a beautiful 19 year old student, who becomes an escort for fun.  While still only students, Daniella and her friend Claire, driven by their desire and curiosity, shared incredible sexual experiences.  Since then, they have gradually understood that they can combine money and fun with increasingly intense sexual adventures.  With each encounter with strangers, the pleasure keeps growing... And they love it!
title: 19 Years, Young Escort Girl
